title: 250 Things to do in Cyprus on a Sunny Day*
description: 250 Things to Do in Cyprus on a Sunny Day* is an insider's guide to Cyprus. It offers expert advice on the best tavernas, the best beaches and the best places to go off the beaten track - not just the popular sights.It's written by Chris Alden, a Cyprus expert who has lived in the beautiful Troodos foothills and has been visiting the island since he was a child.It covers the whole island - including Paphos, Limassol, Troodos, Nicosia, Larnaca and the north - and has tips for sporty types and arty types, lovers of wildlife and fans of authentic Cypriot food and drink.It also includes more than 170 useful web links.So whether you're going on holiday or live on the island and want to discover more, this is the Cyprus travel guide for you.* ... or a rainy one - they happen, you know!
author: Chris  Alden
